DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : HUNTINGTON BEACH ; NEW PHONE_LINE FOR MOBILE_HOME ISSUES
DOC.TEXT: The city has a new call-in telephone_line for city residents who are interested in mobile_home issues . People with concerns about mobile_homes may call ( 714 ) 536-5925 . " These messages will be reported to the ( city ' s ) Mobile_Home Review Committee on a monthly basis , " said Mike Adams , city director of special projects . The Mobile_Home Review Committee was established last year , and it is made_up of three mobile_home residents in the city , three residents who do not live_in mobile_homes or have financial ties to the industry , and three mobile_home park owners.BILL BILLITER
